content.prompt: The most common strategy adopted by developing countries to deal with the problem of population growth is

choices.label: establishing policies that seek to reduce fertility rates
encouraging students studying abroad not to return home
reducing the size of their urban areas

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

topic.text: 5.8: Causes and Effects of Demographic Change

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
